pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 2, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 2, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario  

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 10:00 a.m.

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will attend the Installation of the 29th Governor General of Canada. The Prime Minister will also deliver remarks.

Senate Chamber
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.

Gatineau, Quebec

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception for the Installation of the 29th Governor General of Canada.

Canadian Museum of History
100 Laurier Street
Gatineau

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity upon arrival
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
